title: RP not being added
body: Hey, Ive paid for 20 dollars of RP but it wont give me the RP or take my money, idk if there is a massive delay or something but yeah. Anyone else have this issue?

replies.body:
Hi

It should be all fixed and working now.  We've enabled RP Purchasing again :)

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi BekFast

Thanks for getting in touch - sorry you haven't managed to get RP yet!  We've been working on an issue affecting RP purchases tonight, which might be the cause of what you are seeing.

If you've already bought RP and it hasn't shown up - I'd suggest you [get in touch with the support team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to make sure it goes through correctly.

If you're still waiting to purchase it - I'd say check back in a few hours / tomorrow.  You can check the latest info on server status [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce). 

Cheers!
Mindstar
maybe there is a big delay happening right now,
happening to me aswell but its taken the 20$ and not added rp
